channel.title: Changing XP rates for basic skills. [317]
channel.description: I was wondering how to change the skill xp rates for skills like range, strength, attack, etc.. I'm sure this is easy but I just wanted to make sure. :)

item.source: Changing XP rates for basic skills. [317]

item.title: Changing XP rates for basic skills. [317]
item.dc:creator: @s3v3r3ds0ul s3v3r3ds0ul
item.description:
@s3v3r3ds0ul wrote:

for combat skills open your client.java and search for CombatEXP

and for the first code you’ll see something like this

double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(3000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(3000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(3000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(2000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;

The part that says TotalExp = (double)(####*hitDiff);
is what you’ll be changing. So if you want every hit to give you 1,000 exp you would change the code to this:

double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(1000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;

You should see that same code double TotalExp = 0; if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) { TotalExp = (double)(3000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4); } else if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(3000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID); } else { TotalExp = (double)(3000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength); } TotalExp = (double)(2000*hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp*CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints); attackTimer = 7;
Through out your client.java

Make sure to go through and change every one so you don’t end up with errors.

Read full topic
